item.description:
Come join us as we wave to all the traffic going in and out of the Puritan Backroom Ice Cream Stand from across the street at Livingston Park from about 5 PM - 7 PM.
I plan on ending the activity with something from the Puritan. I will have all the materials and bottled water in the truck, so come on over for a while!

Head north on Elm St., take a right on Webster and a left onto Hooksett Rd. just after Kinne Electric... the Puritan is on your right, Livingston Park on the left, and there is a grassy area there were we probably can stand..

Note: If it rains we likely won't be doing this.
item.name: Sundae Sign Wave Manchester
